name: Wing 5
description:
> *An influx of murderous undead relentlessly hunt innocent worshipers of Grenth. Infiltrate the Underworld and join the struggle for control over the fates of the living and the dead.*

This is the fifth raid wing which is commonly regarded as the most difficult raid wing in the game currently. We will have four encounters:
<:soullesshorror:703930782841962557> **Soulless Horror**: A difficult first boss that heavily favours condi DPS.
<:riverofsouls:703930782636572723> **River of Souls**: An easy encounter that favours having a few extra healers.
<:brokenking:703930780539158599> **Statues of Grenth**: An easy set of three mini bosses.
<:dhuum:703930782590304346> **Dhuum**: A very difficult boss that slightly favours condi DPS.

Please note that condi DPS is **required** for <:soullesshorror:703930782841962557> **Soulless Horror**. On the other encounters, both power and condi DPS work.

<:quick_healer:1176639812900495400> <:alac_healer:1176639815282856017> **Healer Roles:**
- One healer will need to **Tank + G3** on <:soullesshorror:703930782841962557> **Soulless Horror**, <:brokenking:703930780539158599> **Broken King**, <:eaterofsouls:1033371811703947285> **Eater of Souls**, and <:dhuum:703930782590304346> **Dhuum**. <:soullesshorror:703930782841962557> **Soulless Horror** hits tanks like a truck, and tanking on <:dhuum:703930782590304346> **Dhuum** is toughness-based, so do take lots of toughness via gear such as `Minstrel's` or `Giver's`. They will also be expected to do `Green 3` on <:dhuum:703930782590304346> **Dhuum**.
- The other healer will be on **Push + Kite + G2**, which is a role that I would strongly recommend <:druid:763700489011068939> **Druid** for. They will also be expected to do `Green 2` and `Kiting` on <:dhuum:703930782590304346> **Dhuum**.

<:quick_dps:1176639849156051014> <:alac_dps:1176639831720337438> **Boon DPS Roles:**
- One of the boon DPS will need to take the **Tank @ SH** role, which requires you to come on high toughness/survivability gear (such as `Trailblazer's` and `Ritualist's`) to be the second tank on <:soullesshorror:703930782841962557> **Soulless Horror**.

<:dps:1176639819191951390> **DPS Roles:**
- The DPS that takes **G1** is expected to take `Green 1` on <:dhuum:703930782590304346> **Dhuum**.
- The DPS that takes **Boonstrip** is expected to take a class that can strip boons from <:dhuum:703930782590304346> **Dhuum**.
- The DPS that takes **Epidemic** needs to come on a condi <:necromancer:675414199052140555> **Necromancer** build taking the `Epidemic` skill and helping kill the golems on :soullesshorror: **Soulless Horror**.

Let me know if you have any questions!
templateOverview: This template for a Wing 5 run assigns the **Tank / G3** and **Push / Kite / G2** roles to the healers, using a boon DPS for the **Tank @ SH**. <:dps:1176639819191951390> **DPS** are expected to cover **G1**, **Boonstrip**, and **Epidemic**.
